You ask #p2101006# about the fox, but he didn't seem to know what you were talking about. You were at loss of what to do, until you realized something and promised to be #p2101006#'s friend. He smiled and gave you the book Little Prince. Now you should give this to #b#p2040052##k.

When you told #p2040052# you promised to be friends with #p2101006#, he let out a sigh of relief and thanked you for your efforts. Hopefully this straightened out the distorted part in the book #p2101006#. It feels weird being a part of a folk tale...
I've sat in this desert for a long time, and no one else has talked to me except you... And no one has offered to help me as much as you...\r\n#L0# #b Have you seen a fox?

A fox? I've seen some rabbits and #o2100108#s, but not a single fox... Why do you need a fox? For you, I'll do anything to help. \r\n#L0# #b Nah, I don't need anything. Aren't you lonely out here by yourself?

I am lo-- actually, no, I am not. I'm not, since you're here with me. Maybe I arrived in this desert just to meet someone like you... I do feel like that sometimes. \r\n#L0# #bHave you ever thought of returning to where you came from?

I don't know... I do want to return home...but...that means I won't be able to see you anymore. The only reason this desert is even remotely seem beautiful to me is because you're here. \r\n#L0# #b Am I your friend?
Friend...? Is this what friendship is like...?
Honestly, this is the first time I've ever made a true friend. A friend... I like...being friends with someone. I'm so happy. You ARE a friend.
As a way to celebrate our friendship, I'll give you this book. I feel like you need it for some reason. Hopefully this will help.
A friend... Can a rose be a friend?

Wow, you got the storybook of #p2101006#! How is #p2101006#? Was he with a fox? What? He gave you the book after you told him you want to be his friend? Ah, so that's how the story found its equilibrium. I'm glad that happened.
You acted as the fox to #p2101006#, so the story of #p2101006# has straightened its course. Thank you so much. This will also help put #m222020000# back on course.
Someone out there needs this book. I can feel it. You should give the book to that person.
I don't think you've gotten the #bstorybook of #p2101006##k yet. Please observe #b#p2101006##k and discover what he's missing... If you can fill the void, he'll give you the storybook of #p2101006#.
Oh... You lost the book... That's okay. I'll give you another one. We're friends, right?
